content: parsley dishcloth is a quick knit full of texture great for knitting beginners to practice stitches and seasoned knitters looking for an easy relaxing project the dishcloth will make lovely kitchen decor for you an eco-conscious friend or as a general housewarming gift for a close one this pattern has been tech edited and test knit **sizes** one size - width 18 cm 7 length 18 cm 7 **materials** **yarn ** 40 m 44 yds of 24/7 cotton lion brand yarns - 100% cotton 170 m 186 yds per 100g or similar worsted weight category 4 - medium yarn samples worked in colorways bay leaf and camel **needles ** 5 mm us 8 straight or circular needles or to fit gauge **other ** tapestry needle **gauge** 18 stitches x 28 row in 10x10 cm 4x4 in garter stitch blocked
